title: Advanced Online Computer Science Education Program via Smartphone Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental programming concepts and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course for advanced learners capable of self-directed learning in smartphone-centric environments. Provides flexible and accessible education via non-real-time LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can design algorithms to solve real-world problems by applying modular programming concepts
Learners can effectively communicate with peer learners and tutors using asynchronous collaboration tools
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans using LMS-based materials even in resource-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
